title: Inviting Modern Loft with Sunny Dining and Private Yard in Kamienny Potok
description: Enjoy the welcoming atmosphere of this spacious 68 sqm loft in Sopot's sought-after Kamienny Potok. With a clever open-plan layout, this home offers a bright dining area drenched in natural light, a cozy bedroom with an ensuite bathroom, and a second full bathroom—perfect for guests or family. Store away your belongings in the convenient storage locker, and experience comfort year-round with energy-efficient windows keeping your sanctuary peaceful and warm. Step outside to your fenced yard, an ideal spot for relaxing with friends or letting children play securely.
neighborhood_description: Kamienny Potok is a well-established and modern neighborhood, known for its lush parks and easy access to cycling paths, fostering an active outdoor lifestyle. Residents benefit from close proximity to Sopot's business district and family-friendly amenities, making day-to-day errands and commuting a breeze. Great public transport options and dedicated bike lanes provide seamless access around Sopot and the Tri-City area.

target_buyer: Ideal for expat singles or couples seeking an active, convenient, and family-friendly base in the Tricity area, offering comfort, privacy, and easy access to both work and local amenities.
market_positioning: This loft stands out as a rare find in Kamienny Potok, appealing to those who value modern design, energy-efficient details, and outdoor space, all within a mid-range budget and close-knit neighborhood environment.
